item.title: Unto You
item.itunes:title: Unto You
item.itunes:author: churchofgodpreaching.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Guthrie Assembly Meeting 12/30/2023
item.itunes:summary:
Marty Clevenger delivers a sermon reflecting on the meaning of Christmas and the gift of salvation through Christ. Bro. Marty explores differing perspectives from outright rejection to wholehearted embrace of Christmas traditions. He emphasizes moving beyond debates over dates, origins or even outward observances to focus on accepting Christ’s gift of redemption, forgiveness and healing for ourselves. Through illustrations of a wild raccoon, tangled buck deer antlers, broken cisterns in a thirsty land, and the crucifixion scene, the message highlights parallels like fighting the gift or laboring to save ourselves versus simply receiving God’s grace.
Audio provided by churchofgodpreaching.com. Recorded 12/30/2023 at the Church of God Oklahoma Assembly Meeting in Guthrie, OK.
Scriptures referenced: Philippians 1, Luke 2, John 3, Jeremiah
